website.name: AERO ENTERPRISES
website.description: AERO ENTERPRISES is your trusted partner for precision sheet metal supply. We offer high-quality, custom metal solutions tailored to your needs. Serving industries nationwide with excellence and reliability.

pages.title: AERO ENTERPRISES - Your Trusted Sheet Metal Supplier
pages.description: AERO ENTERPRISES offers premium sheet metal products and solutions for various industrial applications. We provide high-quality materials with expert engineering and state-of-the-art facilities.
pages.main_content: Home page featuring company overview, excellence features, and affiliated companies including SAGAR METAL CUTTING WORKS, AERO AUTOMOTIVE PARTS, and AERO LED LIGHTING SOLUTIONS.

pages.title: Our Products - AERO ENTERPRISES
pages.description: Explore our premium sheet metal products including Cold Rolled Coil (CRC), Hot Rolled (HR), Galvanized Iron (GI), Pickled and Oiled, and Stainless Steel sheets for various industrial applications.
pages.main_content: Products page showcasing various sheet metal types including CRC, HR, GI, Pickled and Oiled, and Stainless Steel sheets with descriptions and images.

pages.title: Contact Us - AERO ENTERPRISES
pages.description: Get in touch with AERO ENTERPRISES for inquiries and quotes about our sheet metal products. Located in Vasai, Maharashtra with dedicated customer service.
pages.main_content: Contact page with location details (Gala No. 1, Khan Compound, Near Gausiya Weight Kata, Dhumal Nagar, Vasai - 401208 Palghar), phone numbers (+91 9096105019, +91 7972547196), and email (aeroenterprises00@gmail.com).

business_info.address: Gala No. 1, Khan Compound, Near Gausiya Weight Kata, Dhumal Nagar, Vasai - 401208 Palghar

products.name: COLD ROLLED COIL - CRC SHEET
products.description: CRC sheets offer a smooth surface and precise thickness for superior formability. Ideal for automotive, appliances, and precision engineering applications.

products.name: HOT ROLLED - HR SHEET
products.description: HR sheets provide cost-effective strength and ductility for structural uses. Perfect for construction, pipelines, and heavy machinery fabrication.

products.name: GALVANIZED IRON - GI Sheet
products.description: GI sheets feature a zinc coating for excellent corrosion resistance. Widely used in roofing, cladding, and HVAC systems.

products.name: PICKLED AND OILED - PICKLE SHEET
products.description: Pickle sheets have a clean, scale-free surface for enhanced workability. Suitable for automotive, tubing, and structural fabrications.

products.name: STAINLESS STEEL - SS SHEET
products.description: SS sheets deliver corrosion resistance and a sleek finish for diverse applications. Ideal for kitchen equipment, architecture, and marine environments.
